member.name: T:Siemens.Engineering.AddIn.SafetyCompile.Workflow.SafetyCompileAddInProvider
member.summary: Following is the hierarchy of Workflow as described by AddIn framework CaxAddInProvider -Provides-> CaxWorkflowAddIn -Gets-> CaxExportWorkflowSupport, CaxImportWorkflowSupport -Gets-> CaxPostExportWorkflowItem, CaxPreExportWorkflowItem, CaxPostImportWorkflowItem, CaxPreImportWorkflowItem -Execute API This is the starting point for the add-in author to design their workflow extensions Refer to wiki: for more details
